content: Provide a comprehensive analysis of the advantages and disadvantages of using WordPress as a blogging platform for a business that focuses on eco-friendly products. In addition to a written summary, include a comparison table of WordPress with at least two other popular blogging platforms, a code snippet demonstrating how to customize the design of a WordPress theme, and a section on the potential impact of WordPress's SEO capabilities on the organic traffic of the business's website. Finally, provide a brief overview of the different types of WordPress hosting options available and their respective pros and cons.
